name: Last Chance (Furious_Witch)
description:
The world has ended or did it?

Nature has finally turned on us in a huge orchestration of natural disasters that humans are not supposed to survive.

May be if we try to redeem ourselves one last time it could save us.

How to play:

  • Collect seeds from around you (seeds are thrown on the ground in groups of three)
  •  Plant them in your farm plots (each farmplot requires 9 seeds)
  • Watch them grow and give back
  • Plants decrease toxicity 
  • Sandstorms decrease your health and they are quite frequent and unstable
  • Move to your hatch door to take shelter and recover health
  • Decrease toxicity to zero to win

Controls:

  • Left mouse clicke to move 
  • Collect seeds by moving over them
  • Plant seeds by moving over farmplots
  • Take shelter and heal by standing over your shelter door
